initiate.prompt: What type of HR report or service are you looking for?
initiate.errorHandling: Please ensure you are selecting the correct HR-related option.

reportType.description: Ask the user to specify the type of HR-related report or request.
reportType.question: What kind of HR service or report would you like? Options include Employee Report, Recruitment Summary, Payroll Report, etc.

option_details.name: Employee Report
option_details.description: Provides an overview of employee details such as demographics, positions, and tenure.

option_details.name: Recruitment Summary
option_details.description: Summarizes the recruitment activities, including vacancies, applications, and hiring status.

option_details.name: Payroll Report
option_details.description: Provides details of salaries, bonuses, deductions, and other payroll components.

option_details.name: Attendance Report
option_details.description: Tracks employee attendance, including absences, tardiness, and working hours.

option_details.name: Performance Evaluation Report
option_details.description: Evaluates employee performance based on specific KPIs and manager feedback.

option_details.name: Training and Development Report
option_details.description: Summarizes the training programs and employee participation.

option_details.name: Employee Engagement Report
option_details.description: Analyzes employee satisfaction and engagement levels.

option_details.name: Diversity and Inclusion Report
option_details.description: Tracks diversity metrics and inclusion initiatives.

option_details.name: Attrition Report
option_details.description: Details employee exits, reasons for leaving, and retention metrics.

option_details.name: Leave Report
option_details.description: Provides insights into employee leaves and leave balances.

option_details.name: Compliance Report
option_details.description: Ensures adherence to company policies and labor laws.

validations.errorMessage: Please select a valid HR report or service from the available options.

reportType.responseValidation: Ensure that the selected report is relevant to the HR Department.

timePeriod.question: For what time period do you need the report? Options include Daily, Weekly, Monthly, etc.

validations.customDateRangeHandling: If 'Custom Date Range' is selected, ask for the start and end dates.

timePeriod.responseValidation: Check if the selected time period matches the requested report type.

metrics.description: Ask the user which key HR metrics they would like to include
metrics.question: Which HR metrics should be included in the report? Common metrics include Employee Turnover Rate, Time to Fill, and Employee Satisfaction Score.

validations.errorMessage: Please select at least one metric.

metrics.responseValidation: Verify that the selected metrics are relevant for the chosen HR report type.

visualization.question: How would you like the data to be visualized? Bar chart, Pie chart, Line graph, or Table?

options.name: Bar Chart
options.description: A chart that displays categorical data with rectangular bars.

subtypes.description: Displays data in vertical bars to compare different categories.
Displays data in horizontal bars for comparative analysis.
Displays the total of different sub-categories in a stacked format.

options.name: Pie Chart
options.description: A circular chart divided into slices to illustrate numerical proportions.

subtypes.description: Displays proportional data as slices of a pie.
Adds depth to the slices to create a 3D effect.
Similar to a pie chart but with a hole in the center.

options.name: Line Graph
options.description: Displays data points connected by a line, often used for trends over time.

subtypes.description: Connects data points with straight lines.
Connects data points with smooth, curved lines.
Fills the area beneath the line for cumulative data.

options.name: Scatter Plot
options.description: A graph with points plotted to represent values for two variables.

subtypes.description: Simple scatter plot with points representing two variables.
Similar to scatter plot but adds size to the points to represent a third variable.

options.name: Heatmap
options.description: A matrix representation where values are represented by color gradients.

subtypes.description: Displays data values with color intensity.

validations.errorMessage: Please choose a valid visualization type.

visualization.responseValidation: Make sure the selected visualization is applicable to the report data.

rules: Ensure that responses align with the Finance and Accounting department's domain and the report type requested.

prompts.invalidInput: Your input doesn't seem relevant to Finance and Accounting. Could you please provide a valid response?
prompts.retryPrompt: Can you clarify your request? Let's ensure the report meets your needs.
